text: "Forever Together" is a 1991 song by Randy Travis. Forever Together may also refer to: * Forever Together (film) or Can't Be Heaven, a 1999 American film * Forever Together (American horse) (foaled 2004), a Thoroughbred racehorse * Forever Together (Irish horse) (foaled 2015), a Thoroughbred racehorse ==See also== * Together Forever (disambiguation)
title: Forever Together (disambiguation)
